attributes.action: explain to the Nation what exactly is money and how it is created, by whom and for whom.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If one [search engine's] "money as debt" the totally non humorous point of this vital piece of National education will become apparent.

rejection.details: Your petition does not make a relevant point about government policy.
reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
